steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Place the cursor at the location where you want to insert the citation.
Go to the 'References' tab in the Word ribbon.
Select the appropriate citation style from the drop-down menu.
Enter the details of the citation, such as author name, title, and publication year.
Click 'OK' to insert the citation into the document.
Review the inserted citation to ensure it appears correctly.
